The nutrition forum provides the space for sharing information however it also strengthens the willingness of sub-national stakeholders to commit to follow up actions at the provincial level that support scaling up of nutrition interventions.

2460/A0/04/300/002.status_value: 43%  UNICEF advocacy efforts in partnership with WHO  Lux Development and USAID resulted in increased national budget commitment to the procurement of vaccines. In 2013  43% of traditional vaccines were procured by the government funds. The Ministry of Health has committed estimated US$500 000 from the national budget for the procurement of traditional vaccines in 2014. This is budgeted in addition to GAVI co-financing US$ 247 000.
2460/A0/04/300/002.indicator_name: % national budget allocated to the procurement of traditional vaccines

2460/A0/04/300/002.status_value: 14 percentage point  Constrained  but some progress UNICEF supported districts have not conducted four health outreach sessions on timely basis due to management and coordination issues -- central and provincial level prioritized other activities such as roll out of new provider payment initiatives  fixed site delivery of services and implementation of vertical immunization activities (JE and Flu immunization)  which overstretched already limited capacities at the districts and HC level and resu

2460/A0/04/300/001.status_value: The operational assessment has been partially completed by the GAVI supported Financial Sustainability Assessment for Immunization which looked specifically at Integrated Outreach as the core delivery mechanism for child health services. The draft recommendations provide a strong platform from which to build consensus with MOH and development partners on the need to harmonize integrated health outreach policy and practice and to strengthen its equity orientation
2460/A0/04/300/001.indicator_name: UNICEF-supported evidence generation activities inform national policy and practice in the area of integrated outreach and strengthen its equity orientation
2460/A0/04/300/001.baseline_value: No operational assessment of the current practice of integrated health outreach  current outreach guidelines do not have specific equity-focused planning and implementation perspective

2460/A0/04/300/001.status_value: All districts have included outreach in their plans and have confirmed budget for 2012 and 2013. 2460/A0/04/300/001.baseline_value: Outreach is not always included in the provincial plans and budget is not always secured in advance
